examples: Please take the trash to the garbage can.Take money from the bank when needed.We are ready to take your order.It takes a lot of money to live in that city.The journey from London to Oxford takes about an hour and a half.Bob did not take the job because it was a blind alley.I hope you will take the advice in good part.How am I supposed to take that remark?I shall take literature and mathematics this spring.How long will it take me to get there?She took another sip of tea.I take this seriously. It's a matter of principle.She always takes the bus in order to save some money.Love includes gives and takes.The lioness brought her take to her baby.

请将垃圾拿到垃圾筒去。需要时,把钱从银行里取出来。我们随时准备执行您的命令。要住在那个城市需要花不少钱。从伦敦到牛津大约需要一个半小时。鲍勃没有接受此职，因为它没有发展前途。我希望你能愉快地接受这劝告。我应该怎么理解那话的意思?今年春天我要修文学及数学。到那儿要花多长时间？她又喝了一小口茶。我对此很认真。这是原则问题。为了可以节省钱,她总是搭乘公车。爱情包含着给予和索取。母狮子把捕获的猎物叼给了狮宝宝。

translation: vt. 说；谈话；讨论vi. 谈话；说闲话n. 谈话；演讲；空谈
examples: I wish to talk with you in private.We need to hold another meeting next week to talk about some technical problems.In the hall a woman was talking on diet and health.He went on to talk about the world situation at present.He talked his father into lending him the car.I had a long talk with her that night.The talks between the two premiers will be held next month.The officers held a long talk about the price control and pay rise.She delivered a talk on philosophy to the society.In politics there is too much talk and not enough action.
我希望能私下里同你谈话。我们需要在下周再举行一次会议,来讨论一些技术性的问题。在那个大厅里,一名女性正在就饮食与健康发表演讲。他接着又阐述了当期的世界形势。他说服他的父亲把汽车借给他。那天晚上,我和她秉烛长谈。两国总理的会谈将于下月举行。官员们就价格调控和工资上涨进行了长时间的讨论。她给学会作了一次有关哲学的讲话。在政治方面向来是说得多做得少。

translation: adj. 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的adv. 夸大地n. (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒
examples: The boy is 150 centimetres tall.She's tall for her age.The tall hedge breaks the force of the wind .That woman wore a very tall hat on her head.
这个男孩身高150厘米。从她的年龄来看，她个子算是高的。高的树篱能减弱风力。那个妇女戴了一顶很高的帽子。

translation: n. 胶带；磁带；带子；卷尺vt. 录音；用带子捆扎；用胶布把…封住vi. 用磁带录音n. (Tape)人名；(英)泰普
examples: I've got all the Beethoven symphonies on tape.Cassette tape recorders are gradually out of date now.You'd better put some insulating tape on electric wires.The two runners broke the tape together.I taped a late-night radio show and listened to it in the morning.We have taped the wedding ceremony.Shall I tie the package or tape it?The doctor has taped up my swollen ankle.Wrap a tape measure around your waist at the level of your navel.The first step is an accurate measurement of the walls that are to be covered.Use a yardstick or steel tape measure.
我有贝多芬交响乐全部的录音带。现在,盒式磁带录音机渐渐过时了。你最好给电线裹上绝缘胶布。两位赛跑运动员在终点同时撞线。我录下午夜的收音机节目,早上听。我们已经给婚礼录了像。我把这个包裹捆起来还是贴胶带?医生用绷带把我肿起的脚踝包扎起来。在腰部的肚脐水平位置用卷尺测量腰围。第一步就是精确测量被覆盖了的墙面，使用标尺或者钢卷尺测量。

translation: n. 味道；品味；审美vt. 尝；体验vi. 尝起来；有…的味道n. (Taste)人名；(法)塔斯特
examples: I've got a cold and so I have lost my sense of taste.The medicine has a bitter taste.She likes her first taste of life in a big city.She has good taste in clothes.They have not at least been given a taste for nature in early life.That's the best wine I've ever tasted.You can taste the curry to see if it's hot enough.This soup tastes of chicken.It's been 13 years since they last tasted victory.
我伤风了,尝不出味道。这药有苦味。她喜欢她对大城市生活的初次体验。她对服装有很好的审美眼光。至少,他们在少年时期没有受到爱好自然的培养。那是我喝过的最好的酒你可以尝尝这道咖喱菜，看看够不够辣。这汤里有鸡肉的味道。我们已经有13年没有体验胜利的滋味了。

translation: 免税的；免税店
examples: I thought this camera by duty free.The two bottles of liquor are allowed in duty free.
我认为这台相机应该是免税的。这两瓶酒是免税的。

translation: vi. 乘出租车；滑行vt. 使滑行；用出租车送n. 出租汽车
examples: Let me go shares with you in the taxi fare.If you want to ensure that you catch the plane, take a taxi.That may be our taxi now!I got in a taxi and rushed to the company.Queue here for a taxi.Please taxi documents to the law office.I would taxi home and sleep till eight.You can taxi back to the apron via taxiway No.5.
我和你分摊计程车费吧。你要想确保能赶上那班飞机，就坐出租车去吧。那辆可能就是我们的计程车了。我搭了一辆计程车赶往公司。等候出租汽车在此排队。请用出租汽车把文件送到律师事务所。我会坐出租车回家，一直睡到八点。你可以通过五号滑行道回到停机坪。

translation: n. 茶叶；茶树；茶点vt. 给…沏茶vi. 喝茶；进茶点n. (Tea)人名；(柬)迪
examples: A nice cup of tea will soothe your nerves.I'd like to place an order for some tea with you.Tea plants grow well on the fertile mountain land.They were regaled with tea and cakes.
一杯好茶可以使你的心绪平静下来。我想从贵公司订购一些茶叶。茶树在这片肥沃的山地上长得很好。他们被飨以茶点。

translation: vt. 教；教授；教导vi. 教授；讲授；当老师n. (Teach)人名；(英)蒂奇
examples: I taught her to ride a bicycle.His parents employed a tutor to teach him Greek.Parents should teach their children table manners.I've been invited to teach Chinese at the University of New York for one year.I'll teach you to call me a liar!My purpose is to teach them a lesson.I am going to teach until my son can earn money.It is one thing to learn, and another to teach.
我教她骑自行车。他父母雇佣了一位家庭教师来教他希腊语。双亲应该教导他们的小孩餐桌礼仪。我应聘去纽约大学讲授一年汉语。你说我说谎，我就要教训你！我的目的是给他们一个教训。我教书要教到我儿子能够赚钱。学是一回事，教是另一回事。

translation: n. 教师；导师n. (Teacher)人名；(英)蒂彻
examples: I asked the teacher for her advice.She is a teacher aged only twenty.My foreign teacher came from Australia.The maths teacher was furious and gave me 50 lines.My mother is a teacher.
我征求这位老师的意见。她是一位年仅二十岁的教师。我的外籍教师来自澳大利亚。数学老师气坏了，罚我抄书50行。我母亲是一位教师。

translation: n. 队；组vt. 使合作vi. 合作n. (Team)人名；(柬)甸
examples: John is the spark plug on his rowing team.A cricket team is comprised of eleven players.A team of nurses assisted the doctor in performing the operation.It's hard to team these colours up.He didn't want to team up with anybody.Volleyball is a team game.We won't hire anyone who isn't team player.
约翰是划船队的中坚分子。一个板球队由11名队员组成。一组护士协助医生施行手术。把这些颜色配起来是困难的。他不想与任何人合作。排球是一项要求全队默契配合的运动。我们不会雇佣不配合集体工作的人。

translation: n. 团队合作；协力
examples: They showed ever exceptionally good teamwork.Only teamwork will enable us to get the job done on time.In football teamwork is even more important than individual skill.Good teamwork means that you can get more done during work time.Teamwork, for many of us, is a big switch from how we're accustomed to functioning.
他们配合得非常之好。只有团结一致,我们才能按时完成这项工作。在橄榄球比赛中，全队的配合比个人技术甚至更加重要。良好的团队精神意味着高度的工作效率。对我们中的许多人来说，团队工作极大的改变了我们习惯的工作模式。

translation: n. 茶壶小题大做
examples: This teapot doesn't pour well.This teapot's got a broken spout.
这个茶壶不好倒。这茶壶的壶嘴坏了。

translation: n. 眼泪, （撕破的）洞或裂缝, 撕扯vt. 撕掉, 扯下, 扰乱vi. 流泪, 撕破n. (Tear)人名；(英)蒂尔
examples: Take the book from Alice, she will tear it.Nails that project may tear your clothes.Her heart was torn by anxiety.Don began to tear up when he talked about his son.Don't pull the pages so hard or they will tear.My wife burst into tears when she heard the bad news.She shed crocodile tear over his death.She is mending a tear in her dress.They steal handkerchiefs, they tear off buttons, and they even cut off pieces of the unfortunate singers' hair.
把书从艾丽斯那拿开，她会撕了它的。突出的钉子会刮坏你的衣服。她焦虑得心都快碎了。唐谈论起他的儿子就开始哭。别那麽使劲扯书页，那会撕破的。我太太听到这个坏消息就哭了起来。她为他的死而假哭了一场。她在缝补洋装上的破洞。他们偷歌手的手帕，撕扯纽扣，甚至会剪下歌手的头发。

translation: n. 技术；工艺；术语
examples: The government saw the introduction of new technology as vital.Britain is behind Japan in developing modern technologies.He majors in engine technology in this college.They are studying chemical technology.
政府认为引进新技术至关重要。在发展现代技术方面英国落后于日本。他在这所学院主修发动机工艺。他们在研究化学工艺学。

translation: vt. 告诉，说；辨别；吩咐；断定vi. 讲述；告发，泄密；识别n. (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒
examples: It's very kind of you to tell me the truth.Let me tell you some details about clearance.Tell that joker to stop using my parking space.He always does what his superiors tell him.He wanted to tell the news to the world.I always tell my daughter a story before she goes to sleep.I can't tell you how happy I am.Our sweetest songs are those that tell of saddnest thought.It is hard to tell who is who in the parade.I can never tell natural silk from artificial.It's impossible to tell who will win the next election.I can tell from the way you speak that you are from Australia.You promised not to tell but you have done so .They pledged themselves never to tell the secret .You're saying you gonna tell on me?If someone tried to blackmail me I would tell the police.Your efforts are beginning to tell.His unselfish work is beginning to tell.

你真好,告诉我这真相。让我告诉你一些通关的细节。叫那个家伙不要占用我的停车场。他惟上级之命是从。他要把这件事告诉每一个人。女儿睡觉之前，我总讲故事给她听。我无法向你表达我多么高兴。我们最甜蜜的歌就是表达最苦恼思想的歌。在游行队伍中很难分清谁是谁。我不能分辨真丝和人造丝。下届选举谁能获胜无法预知。根据你说话的方式,我能判断你是澳大利亚人。你曾保证过不泄露机密，可是你却把它泄露了出去。他们保证绝不泄露秘密。你是说你想要告发我?如果有人企图敲诈我，我就向警察告发。你的努力正在开始产生效果。他无私的工作开始产生效果。

translation: n. 温度；体温；气温；发烧
examples: The temperature has stayed hot this week.The temperature soared to 43 degrees centigrade on July 25.After the storm there will be a sharp drop in temperature.Let me take his (her) temperature and have a check.He coughed, his temperature was a little up.Water freezes at the temperature of 0 degrees Celsius.This heating system has an automatic temperature control.There is an imperceptible change in temperature.The temperature of volcanic gases is very high.The food should be kept at low temperature.When I was ill, I had a high temperature; I felt very hot.She's been running a temperature of 100°F for two days.
本周气温一直都很热。7月25日,气温猛升到4摄氏度。风暴过后,气温会骤降。我来给他(她)量一下体温,检查一下。他咳嗽,体温也有点高。水在摄氏零度结冰。这个暖气系统有自动化的温度调节系统。温度有细微的变化。火山气体的温度很高。这种食品应低温保存。当我病的时候，发高烧；我感到非常热。她已经连续两天发烧到100（华氏）度了。

translation: n. 网球（运动）n. （英）坦尼斯（人名）
examples: Do you play tennis?I'm just a rabbit at tennis.I won the tennis tournament.I want to buy a new tennis bat.They were adversaries in the tennis match.He hit the tennis ball over the net.Some of my friends develop their arm muscles by playing tennis.
你打网球吗？我网球打得很差劲。我赢了那场网球比赛。我想要买一个新网球拍。在网球赛中，他们是对手。他把网球打过了网。我的一些朋友通过打网球锻炼他们胳膊的肌肉。

translation: num. 十个，十n. (Ten)人名；(英)坦恩；(意)泰恩；(柬)登
examples: He has been an exile for ten years.The dictator met his doom after ten years of rule.
他已经流亡十年。独裁者统治了十年终於完蛋了。

translation: n. 帐篷；住处；帷幕vt. 用帐篷遮盖；使在帐篷里住宿vi. 住帐蓬；暂时居住n. (Tent)人名；(罗、瑞典)滕特
examples: They set up a tent near the seashore.The wind caused the tent to collapse.Please slacken the tent rope before it rains.The tent flaps should be tightly fastened.Last night, we tented in the forest.We're going to tent in the Golden Hill for a week.
他们在海滨附近搭起了一个帐篷。风把帐篷吹塌了。下雨前，请将帐篷的绳索放松。帐篷的帘布应紧紧系住。昨夜我们在森林里住帐篷。我们将在金山宿营一周。

translation: n. 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项vt. 把…叫做n. (Term)人名；(泰)丁
examples: Are there any exams at the end of this term?I am not familiar with chemical terms.Another firm has offered more advantageous terms than yours.The company has fulfilled all the terms of the agreement.They had set a term to the contract.Would you please explain the meaning of this term?He termed the play a tragedy.
这个学期期末有考试吗？我不熟悉化学术语。另一家公司提出的条件比你们的优惠。公司已经履行了协议中的所有条款。他们已给合同定了期限。请你解释一下这个名词的意义好吗？他称该剧为悲剧。

translation: adj. 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的adv. 很，非常
examples: The earthquake was a terrible catastrophe.If they had any respect for human life they wouldn't do such terrible things.The government didn't allow reporting the terrible accident.What terrible weather!Unlike my sister, I am a terrible cook.
这次地震是个可怕的灾难。他们如果还顾及人的生命就不会做出这样可怕的事来。政府不允许报道那起严重事故。多坏的天气。和我妹妹不同，我是一个糟糕的厨师。

translation: n. 教科书，课本
examples: Each student was issued with a textbook.This textbook has twenty lessons.There is a glossary at the end of the textbook.That old edition won't do for a textbook.
每个学生发了一本课本。这课本有二十课。这本教科书后面有词汇表。那一老版本作为教科书是不行的。

translation: conj. 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）prep. 比；超过n. (Than)人名；(老、柬、德)坦；(缅)丹
examples: She was older than I was.I was inspired to work harder than ever before.This street is four times shorter than that one.John is more diligent than anyone else in his class.
她年纪比我大。我受激励比以往任何时候都更加努力地工作。这条街道比那条短四倍。约翰比班上其他的同学用功。

translation: vt. 感谢n. 感谢int. 谢谢
examples: Thank you all the same.I don't know how I can possibly thank you enough.I'd like to take this opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work on the project.Thank God, grant me a good friend.Thank you for your kind invitation.She can thank herself for this accident.You've got John to thank for the mistake.Please convey my thank to your wife.I'm writing a letter of thanks to them.
不管怎样，还是要谢谢你。我不知道该怎样来感谢你才好。我愿借此机会感谢每一位为这个项目辛勤工作的人。谢谢上帝，赐给我一个好朋友。谢谢你的盛情邀请。这个事故要怪她自己。这错误你得怪约翰。请向你的妻子转达我的谢意。我在给他们写一封谢函。

translation: adj. 感谢的；欣慰的
examples: Oh, we have a lot to be thankful for.Seeds of discouragement will not grow in the thankful heart.So I am ready to accompany you with a thankful heart.
啊，我们有很多需要感谢的事情。气馁的种子在感激的心中不会生长。我带着一颗感激的心准备随你去。

translation: pron. 那；那个adv. 那么；那样conj. 因为；以至于adj. 那；那个n. (That)人名；(德)塔特
examples: What is the difference between this and that?I walked to the gate that opened towards the lake.The output of steel this year has increased by 20% compared with that in 1992.I am well aware that this is a tough job.He claimed that the newspaper report was a libel.That she is still alive is really a relief to us all.That book isn't mine. I guess it belongs to Mike.That girl frequents my dreams--I think she is just the one for me.He once lived in a small village. That village is surrounded by high mountains.Is your problem that complicated?You needn't take what he said that seriously.Life isn't that bad if you just believe in its beauties.

这个和那个之间的区别是什么？我走向那扇临湖的大门。今年钢产量比一九九二年增长了百分之二十。我深知这是一件棘手的工作。他声称报纸上的报导是一种诽谤。她还活着,这真是令我们所有人都感到宽慰的一件事。那本书不是我的，我猜大概是麦克的。那个女孩经常出现在我的梦中——我想她就是我命中要追寻的那个人。他曾经在一个小村庄里生活过。那个小村庄四面都被高山环绕。你的问题非常复杂吗?你不需要很认真地接受他的话。如果你相信美好事物的存在,那么生活就没有那么糟糕。

translation: art. 这；那adv. 更加（用于比较级，最高级前）
examples: I reached the gate that opened towards the lake.Is it necessary for me to attend the meeting?The electrical installations are very old.Don't worry. The dangerous criminals have all been locked up.I want the larger television.Marilyn Monroe is the most famous of all american movie queens.The more he has, the more he wants.
我走到临湖而开的那扇门前。我真的必须参加这个会议吗？这些装置那么残旧。别担心,那些危险的犯罪分子都被关起来了。我想要那台较大的电视机。玛丽莲·梦露是全美最著名的影后。他得到越多，想要的也越多。

translation: n. 电影院，戏院；戏剧；阶梯式讲堂
examples: There is a ban on smoking in the theatre.I waited for her in the lobby of theatre yesterday.Crowds disgorged from the theatre into the dark street.The theatre gives two performances a day.Do you enjoy the theatre?She is been in the theatre all her life.Some of us do not know much about the theatre.I like music, theatre and cinema.She was in the operating theatre for two hours.They fought in the Pacific theatre during World War II.Excuse me, is this bus for the theatre?I've got complimentary tickets for the theatre.
这剧院内禁止吸烟。昨天我在戏院的大厅等她。人流从戏院涌出，进入了黑洞洞的街道。剧院一天上演两场。你喜欢看戏吗？她一辈子搞戏剧。我们中有一些人还不太懂得戏剧。我喜欢音乐、戏剧和电影。她在手术室里已经两个小时了。他们在第二次世界大战的太平洋战区打过仗。打扰了，这是到戏院的公共汽车吗？我得到了戏院的赠票。

translation: pron. 他们的，她们的；它们的n. (Their)人名；(英)蒂尔；(芬、瑞典)泰尔
examples: They washed their faces.Children depend on their parents for food and clothing.Young mothers are gushing over their babies.We have no idea how the birds find their way.
他们洗了脸。小孩依赖他们的父母供给衣食。年轻的母亲滔滔不绝地谈论她们的婴儿。我们不知道这些鸟如何找到它们的路。

translation: pron. 他们的；她们的；它们的
examples: Theirs are blue.Our house adjoins theirs.It was his fault, not theirs.They were off to visit a friend of theirs.Mine is here, and theirs are on the table.So far as I know, our football team is more advanced than theirs.
他们的是蓝色的。我们的房屋与他们的毗连。这是他的过错，不是他们的。他们动身去拜访他们的朋友。我的在这里，他们的在桌子上。就我所知，我们的足球队比他们的有实力。

translation: pron. 他们；它们；她们n. (Them)人名；(老)探
examples: Let's go visit them.A feeling of resentment urged him to abandon them.Don't bend the wires down, it'll break them.If anyone arrives early, ask them to wait.If a customer came in before I get back, ask them to wait.
让我们去拜访他们吧。一种怨恨的心情促使他离开了她们。不要弯折那些线，会弄坏它们的。如果有人早到，就让他们等会儿。我回来之前若有顾客来，就请他等一会儿。

translation: pron. 他们自己；他们亲自
examples: They finished the work by themselves.They demand the right to govern themselves.They painted the house themselves.They themselves made the decision.Everyone has to look after themselves.
他们自己完成了这项工作。他们要求自治权。他们亲自油漆了房屋。他们自己做的决定。每人必须照顾好自己。

translation: adv. 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外n. (Then)人名；(德)特恩
examples: He'll be looking for a new secretary then?He took his hat and then left.We lived in the country then.I've sent cards to all my family. Then there's your family and the neighbours.
那么,他就要找个新秘书了？他拿起帽子，随即离开了。我们那时住在乡下。我已给我全家人都寄去了请帖。还要给你家的人及邻居们寄。

translation: adv. 在那里；在那边；在那点上int. 你瞧n. 那个地方
examples: He has a house there and a cottage near the sea.He drove quickly in order to get there on time.Don't panic! We'll soon get you out of there.He, with his mother, lives near there.He stopped his car for a while and went on again from there.I think, strictly speaking, you are wrong there.What little space there was below the sloping ceiling was as closely covered with pictures as an Italian votive chapel.
他在那里有一所房子,在海边还有一个小屋。他开得飞快,以便准时赶到那里。别害怕,我们马上就把你从那里带出去。他和他的母亲住在附近的那个地方。他停了一会儿车并从那儿重新开始。我认为，严格地讲，你在那一点上是错了。倾斜的天花板下面那一点点空间，如同意大利还愿礼拜堂那样密密地贴满了图画。

translation: pron. 这些adj. 这些的
examples: These are my books.I'm just going to check in these books at the library.We have been working hard these days.
这些是我的书。我要去图书馆还这些书。这些天来，我们一直在努力工作。

translation: pron. 他们；它们；她们
examples: Women used to think they were on the shelf at 30.They are going to move to a new house next week.I have a dog and a cat, but they fight all the time.
过去女人一到30岁就认为是过了结婚年龄。下星期他们将迁入新居。我养了一只猫和一只狗，但它们老是打架。

translation: n. 小偷，贼
examples: His enemies labelled him a thief.The thief was confined in a prison.The police set a trap to catch the thief.The thief was caught red-handed.He ran fast enough to catch the thief.The thief slid into the room.The thief slipped away down a side street.
他的敌人称他为贼。窃贼被关押在监狱里。警察设下了捉拿窃贼的圈套。小偷被当场抓住了。他跑得飞快，足以抓住那小偷。小偷溜进房间。小偷悄悄从一条小马路溜走了。

translation: adj. 薄的；瘦的；稀薄的；微弱的vt. 使瘦；使淡；使稀疏vi. 变薄；变瘦；变淡adv. 稀疏地；微弱地n. 细小部分n. (Thin)人名；(越)辰；(柬)廷
examples: The ice on the pond is too thin for skating.His face is thin and very tanned.This string is too thin, I need a thicker piece.Boil down the soup until it gets thicker. I don't like thin soup.
池塘上的冰面太薄了，不能滑冰。他的面孔瘦削,晒得黑黑的。这根绳子太细了,我需要一根粗些的。把汤熬浓,我不喜欢稀汤。

translation: n. 事情；东西；事物；情况
examples: That was the only thing they could count on.I happened on just the thing I'd been looking for.He explained the whole thing from way back.However, teaching is by no means an easy thing.He put his shaving things into a plastic bag.We have a few kitchen things and a dining room set.All things considered, we're doing quite well.As things stand, we won't finish the job on time.
那是他们唯一依靠的东西。我偶然发现了我一直在寻找的东西。他把整件事情解释得很透彻。然而，教书并不是一容易的事情。他将刮脸用具放入塑料袋内。我们有一些厨房用具和一套餐厅设备。从各方面的情况看，我们目前干得挺好。据目前情况看，我们不能按时完成任务了。

translation: vt. 想；认为；想起；想像；打算vi. 想；认为n. 想；想法adj. 思想的
examples: I think you are very brave.Women used to think they were on the shelf at 30.If you want to make money you've got to think money.He was trying to think what to do.I always think about her when it snows.He was almost too sleepy to think any more.I was just thinking what a long way it is.I will have a think and let you know tomorrow.
我认为你非常勇敢。过去女人一到30岁就认为是过了结婚年龄。你要是想赚钱，脑子里就得想著钱。他在努力想办法。每当下雪的时候,我总是想起她。可是他太困了,再想不起什么了。我刚才在琢磨路途太远了。我要好好想一想，明天告诉你。

translation: num. 第三；三分之一adj. 第三的；三分之一的
examples: The favourite came in third.This tennis player ranked third in the world.The boss docked a third of my wages.His party has one third of the seats in Parliament.I have taken a third helping.At the end of the third scene the actress exits.This is the third Sunday in a row that it's rained.With this performance, she has notched up her third championship title.
那个最有希望获胜的却跑了个第三名。这位网球运动员排名世界第三。老板扣掉我三分之一工资。他那个党在议会中占三分之一席位。我已经吃了第三份食物了。该女演员于第三场结束时退场。这是接连着的第三个星期天下雨了。她因这一成绩而获得第三个冠军称号。

translation: adj. 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的
examples: He was thirsty for power.The thirsty man craved for water.Young man should be thirsty for knowledge.
他渴望拥有权力。那个囗渴的人渴喝水。青年人应该渴望知识。

translation: n. 十三；十三岁；十三个num. 十三adj. 十三的；十三个的
examples: The number thirteen is often considered unlucky.When she was thirteen, her family moved to England.
十三这个数字常常认为是个不吉利的数字。十三岁时，她们家搬到了英国。

translation: n. 三十年代num. 三十adj. 三十个的
examples: I'll be thirty next year.I get up at six thirty every morning.She dashed off two letters in thirty minutes.There are more than thirty footmen in this hotel.She has served the family faithfully for thirty years.There were many people with leprosy around the age of thirty.
明年我就满三十岁了。我每天早上六点半起床。她在30分钟内写好了两封信。这家旅馆里有三十多名仆役。她为这个家忠心耿耿地操劳了30年。在三十年代有很多麻疯病人。

translation: pron. 这；这个；这里adj. 这；本；这个；今adv. 这样地；这么n. (This)人名；(法)蒂斯
examples: This is, in part, my own mistake.Now don't laugh when you hear this.It's about this high.I didn't think we'd get this far.
在某种程度上来说,这是我自己的错。听了这个你不要笑。大约有这样高。我未曾想到我们会走得这么远。

translation: adj. 那些的pron. 那些（that的复数）
examples: Successful are those who are willing to take pains.The oranges in the box are better than those on the shelf.Let's forget about those worries.It's time to put away those foolish ideas.I have much sympathy with those homeless people.
成功的人都是那些肯努力的人。箱子的橙子比橱上的那些好。咱们忘掉那些烦恼的事吧。是该放弃那些愚蠢的想法了。我很同情那些无家可归的人。

translation: adv. 可是，虽然；不过；然而conj. 虽然；尽管prep. 但
examples: Though we have tried our best, we lost the game.I don't know him well though I've known him for a long time.Though the task was difficult,they managed to accomplish it on time.They will probably win, though no one thinks so.He said he would come, he didn't, though.Our team lost. It was a good game though.I've a bit of headache. It's nothing much, though.
虽然我们已尽了最大的力量,但还是输了。我对他并不了解，虽然我认识他已经很长时间了。尽管任务困难,他们仍按时完成了。他们可能会获胜，然而没有人这样认为。他说他要来，可是并没有来。我们队输了，可是这也不失为一场好球。我有一点头痛，不过并不厉害。

translation: n. 思想；思考；想法；关心v. 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）
examples: The old man was lost in thought and did not hear us come in.Art is the mold of feeling as language is the mold of thought.They stood possessed by the same thought.The thought nerved me to make an other effort.She lingered on the thought of her loved ones.Let my thought comes to you. When I am gone, like the afterglow of sunset at the margin of starry silence.Learn new culture, create new thought, establish new idea and reach new success.What I dread is to get into a rut. One yearns for freshness of thought and ideas.Take no thought for your future needs.It's the thought that counts.Don't give it another thought.
这个老人凝神沉思，没有听见我们进来。艺术是感情的模制品,犹如语言是思想的模制品。他们站在那儿,心里让同样的想法所盘踞。这种想法激励我再作一番努力。她缠绵地思念着心爱的人儿。在我离别后,让我的思念映照着你,宛如夕阳的余辉环绕着星辰冷寂的边缘。学新文化,创新思想,立新观念,铸就新佳进!我害怕的就是墨守成规。 人总是向往新思想和新观念的。不必为将来的需要而操心。有这份心意就好了。不要再想了.

translation: n. 一千；一千个；许许多多adj. 成千的；无数的
examples: Thousands of spectators watched the sailing.I am a thousand winds that blow.Thousand probabilities do not make one truth.
数千名观众观看了这次游艇比赛。我是扬起千千遍遍的风.无数的可能也不能成就一个事实。

translation: n. 三，三个num. 三adj. 三的，三个的
examples: He is only a child of three.Three of the chickens hatched today.
他只是一个三岁的孩子。今天有三只小鸡出壳。

translation: prep. 通过；穿过；凭借adv. 彻底；从头至尾adj. 直达的；过境的；完结的
examples: The crowd fell back to let the players through.Put the coffee in the filter and let the water through."Did you stop in Oxford on the way?""No, we drove straight through."Don't tell me how it ends--I haven't read all the way through yet.Please hold the line. I'll put you through in a minute.My overcoat is wet through.The ball went through the window.The journey through the jungle was perilous.The hunter stalked the bear through the woods.You can only achieve success through hard work.We'll be in New York Monday through Friday.Welcome on board the 94 through train to Guangzhou.We found a through street.A through beam illuminated the dark road ahead.She was through with the project.How soon will you be through?Todd and I are through.

人群后退让运动员们通过。把咖啡放入过滤器里让水流过。“你们路径牛津时停车了吗？”“没有，我们一直来过来的。”先别告诉我书的结尾--我还没看完呢。请拿好电话,马上就可以为您接通。我的大衣完全湿透了。那球穿过窗子飞去。穿过丛林的旅行充满了危险。那个猎人穿过树林，悄悄走近熊。你得孜孜不倦方能成功。我们从周一至周五将一直待在纽约。欢迎乘坐开往广州去的94次直达列车。我们发现了一条走得通的路。一束透射光照亮了前方黑暗的道路。她完成了这个项目。您要用多长时间打完电话？托德和我吹了。

translation: vt. 投；抛；掷vi. 抛；投掷n. 投掷；冒险
examples: Pick out some good apples from the box, and throw away the rest.The trees threw long shadows across the lawn.It's your turn to throw the dice.He threw the stone in the air.My nephew lives only a stone's throw from my house.What are the requirements for the throw itself?
把好苹果从盒子里捡出来,剩下的扔了。树在草坪上都投下长长的影子。轮到你掷骰子了。他把石头抛向空中。我侄子住得离我家很近。对投掷本身的要求有哪些?

translation: n. 星期四
examples: I'm usually free between Tuesday and Thursday.The meeting is scheduled for Thursday.She's due to arrive on Thursday. Meanwhile, what do we do?The Brethren hold a prayer meeting every Thursday.We have meetings every Thursday afternoon.
我通常在星期二至星期四有空。会议定于星期四举行。她预定星期四到达.教友每周四举行一次祷告会。我们每个星期四下午开会。

translation: vt. 标记号于；滴答地记录n. 滴答声；扁虱；记号；赊欠vi. 发出滴答声；标以记号n. (Tick)人名；(匈、芬)蒂克
examples: The clock ticks very loudly.My watch doesn't tick because it's electronic.The teacher ticks off a name on a list.Listen carefully and tick the sentences which are correct.That's what makes the world tick.Buses and taxis tick over rather noisily.I stopped the car but left the motor ticking over.They could hear the regular tick of the clock.Just wait a tick!There was a nice red tick in the margin.Opposite his own name was a small tick.The tick stops draining you and drops off after you're dead.
这只钟发出很响的滴答声。我的表不滴答作响,因为它是电子表。老师在名单上的一个名字旁打勾。认真听，并标记正确的句子。使世界持续活动的动力，就在于此。公共汽车和出租车空档慢转时噪音很大。我停住汽车，让发动机空转。他们能听见时钟有规律的滴答声。等一下儿!边上打了一个漂亮的红勾。紧接在他名字后面的是一个小对号。你死了以后壁虱才会停止吸你的血,掉下来。

translation: n. 票；入场券，标签；（美）候选人名单；证明书；交通罚款单vt. 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单
examples: Have you got your train ticket?No one is allowed to get his ticket out of turn.The money is raised by the sale of raffle ticket.The ticket tells you the price of this dress.I don't know the price of the dress; its ticket has fallen off.I got a traffic ticket for crossing a red light.They plumped for a third party ticket.All articles in the store are ticketed with the price.He bought a platform ticket at the ticket window.You can get it at that ticket booth or please pay one dollar fifty cents to the driver.The policeman ticketed the parked car.
你拿到火车票了吗？任何人都不准不按次序买票。这笔款是通过出售购物彩券筹集的。标签告诉你这件衣服的价钱。我不知道这件衣服的价钱，它的标签掉了。我因为闯红灯被开了一张罚单。他们积极支持第三方提出的候选人名单。店里的所有物品都有标签标明价格。他到售票窗口买了站台票。你可以在那个售票亭买票，或是上车时付一元五角给司机。警察给这辆停着的车发出违章处罚通知单。

translation: adj. 整齐的；相当大的vt. 整理；收拾；弄整齐vi. 整理；收拾n. 椅子的背罩n. (Tidy)人名；(英)泰迪
examples: She keeps her house very tidy.They sat in her neat and tidy kitchen.He has a tidy mind.Her clothes were clean and tidy.His room is in a clutter so I have to tidy it up.You'd better tidy up before the guests arrive.Make your room as tidy as possible.Mother always keeps the house clean and tidy.
她保持她的住所整整齐齐。他们坐在她那干净整齐的厨房里。他的思维有条理。她的衣服干净整洁。他的房间乱七八糟的，我不得不整理一下。客人们到达前,你最好先把东西整理一下。将你的房间收拾得尽量整洁一些。妈总是把房间收拾得干净整齐。

translation: vt. 系；约束；打结；与…成平局vi. 打结；不分胜负；被用带（或绳子等）系住n. 领带；平局；鞋带；领结；不分胜负n. (Tie)人名；(东南亚国家华语)治；(英)泰伊；(柬)狄
examples: He doesn't want any ties; that's why he never married.Pets can be a tie when you want to go away on holiday.The firm has ties with an American corporation.They want to loosen their ties with Britain.He took off his jacket and loosened his tie.He wore a pale blue shirt and a tie to match.There are ties for sealing plastic bags behind the door.Each team scored twice and the game ended in a tie.I was all thumbs this morning. I couldn't even tie my shoelaces.First hammer the tent pegsinto the ground, then tie the ropes onto them.Please tie the safety belt well because the airplane will be taken off.We must tie him down to the contract.I need a length of wire or string to tie it with.Does this sash tie in front or at the back?The girl tied the ends of the thread.

他不愿受束缚，所以不结婚。要想外出度假时，宠物会成为牵累。该商行与美国一家公司有关系。他们想要削弱同英国的关系。他脱下夹克,松开领带。他身穿淡蓝色的衬衣,系了一条与衬衣相配的领带。门后有封塑料袋用的捆紮条.每个队都有两次得分，比赛不分胜负。今天早上我笨手笨脚的,连鞋带都系不好了。先把系帐篷的桩子打进地里,再把绳子系在桩子上。飞机将要起来,请系好安全带。我们必须使他受合同约束。我需要一根铁丝或绳子来捆它。这腰带是在前面打结还是在後面？这女孩把线的两端结起来。

translation: n. 老虎；凶暴的人n. (Tiger)人名；(英)泰格；(法)蒂热；(瑞典)蒂格
examples: The tiger is a representative of the cat family.The hunter hurled his spear at the tiger.The tiger dragged its kill into the jungle.He moved like a tiger stalking its prey.The number of tigers has reduced abruptly in the last fifty years.He's a tiger on the tennis court.
老虎是猫科动物的典型。猎人用力把他的长矛向虎投去。这只老虎拖着它的猎物进了丛林。他像老虎一样悄悄潜近他的猎物。在过去的五十年里，老虎的数目锐减。他在网球场上是一个凶暴的人。

translation: n. [地理][水文] 冰碛；放钱的抽屉；备用现金prep. 直到conj. 直到...为止vt. 耕种；犁vi. 耕种；耕耘n. (Till)人名；(法)蒂伊；(匈、德、捷)蒂尔；(英)蒂尔(女子教名Matilda的昵称)
examples: The meeting adjourned till five o'clock.Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.Not till then did I realize the danger of the situation.Gee, I can hardly wait till it's dark.We must stick to our task till it is finished.People do not know the value of health till they lose it.
会议延至五点召开。今日事今日毕。直到那个时候我才感到形势的危险。哎呀，我简直等不到天黑了。我们必须继续工作，直至做好为止。直到失去健康，人们才知道健康的可贵。

translation: n. 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数vt. 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度adj. 定时的；定期的；分期的n. (Time)人名；(俄)季梅；(英)泰姆；(罗)蒂梅
examples: Only time will tell if you are right.Reading occupies most of my free time.I referred to my watch for the exact time.Closing time at this pub is eleven o' clock.She is the most progressive writer of the time.Sugar is under allocation during war time.It was the happiest time in his wife .The room is three times larger than that one.He failed his driving test five times.Three-fourths meter is waltz time.The syncopated music for this dance in4/4 time.The experienced car racer can always time his start to perfection.To time a race is to see how long it takes.This egg is hard---you didn't time it properly.He timed that shot beautifully.The earth is divided into 24 time zones.The heating is on a time switch.The police defected a time bomb in the building.a time paymenta time loanThis time draft will fall due at the end of this year.

只有时间才能证明你是否正确。阅读占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。我看了一下手表好知道准确的时间。这酒馆的打烊时间是十一点。她是那个时代最进步的作家。战争时期糖是配给的。那是他一生之中最幸福的时期。这个房间比那个大三倍。他考驾驶执照五次都没及格。三/四拍是华尔滋曲的节拍。曼波曲跳这种舞所用的切分音乐，节拍为4/4拍那位经验丰富的车手总是能够完美地掌握出发的时间。赛跑计时就是看看比赛要花多少时间。这鸡蛋煮老了---你没掌握好火候.他这一击时间恰到好处。地球被分为二十四个时区。暖气靠定时开关自动供热。警察在那幢大楼里查出一枚定时炸弹。分期付款定期贷款这张期票年底到期。

translation: adj. 疲倦的；厌倦的，厌烦的v. 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
examples: I am not in the least tired.If you watch too much TV, you'll feel tired.We reached our destination, tired and hungry.I was too tired to walk any further.I'm tired of his complaints.
我一点也不疲倦。如果你看电视太多,你就会感到疲劳。到达目的地时,我们又累又饿。我累得再也走不动了。我听腻了他的抱怨。

translation: adv. 向前；（门等）关上prep. 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向n. (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)
examples: This will be a great boost to the economy.We come  here to see  you .Her dress reached down to her ankles.This road leads to London.My mother wrote to me every month.He is walking to and fro in the room.Push the door to.
这对于经济发展将是一个巨大的促进。我们来这里是为了看你。她的连衣裙垂至脚踝。这条路通向伦敦。我的母亲每月给我写信。他在房间内踱来踱去。把门关上。

translation: adv. 今天；现今n. 今天；现今n. (Today)人名；(英)托迪
examples: Today is my birthday.Today is Thursday.The fashions of today change very quickly.I feel my fingers are all thumbs today.There is a breath of autumn in the air today.The media have a lot of power today.English is spoken all over the world today.
今天是我的生日。今天是星期四。现今的时装式样变换很快。我觉得我今天笨手笨脚。今天的天气已露出了一丝秋天的气息。现在大众传播媒介有很大的力量。英语现在通用于全世界。

translation: adv. 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共adj. 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的
examples: Let's join hands and struggle together.Let us rejoice together on your success.They lived together as husband and wife for years.They traveled together.We will consult together about her education.The lights flickering ahead of her merged together.They tunked their heads together.I am glad we have come together at last.The committee finally got together on the proposal.She sat for hours together just starring into the space.He's incredibly together for someone so young.
咱们携起手来共同斗争。让我们共同庆祝你的成功。他们结为夫妇共同生活了很多年。他们一起旅游。我们将一起商议她的教育事宜。她前面的灯光融合到了一起。他们的头碰到了一起。很高兴我们终于取得了一致。委员会对该项建议终于取得了一致意见。她连续几个小时坐在那里怔怔地望着远方。他这个人年纪轻轻，办事如此稳当，真是了不起。

translation: n. 东京（日本首都）
examples: Tokyo is a human beehive of a city.She dropped me off downtown in Tokyo.
东京是个像蜂窝般人囗集中而热闹的都市。她在东京同我分手了。

translation: n. 番茄，西红柿
examples: Would you like some tomato paste?His shirt was stained with tomato juice.Most tomatoes are red when ripe, but some kinds are yellow.Is a tomato a fruit or a vegetable?You would better heat up the tomato soup .
你要西红柿酱吗？我的衬衣被西红柿汁污染了。大多数西红柿成熟时是红色的，但有些品种是黄色的。蕃茄是水果还是蔬菜?你最好把蕃茄汤热一下。

translation: n. 明天；未来adv. 明天；未来地（等于to-morrow）
examples: We will play basketball tomorrow.I will take an examination tomorrow.If weather permits, we will go to the park tomorrow.I bought some buns for tomorrow's breakfast.Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.A still better tomorrow lies ahead of you.I believe tomorrow will be better.
我们明天打篮球。明天我将参加一场考试。如果天气好的话,明天我们去公园。我买了几个圆面包当明天的早餐。今日事今日毕。展现在你们前面的是更加美好的未来。我相信未来更美好。

translation: adv. 在今晚n. 今晚
examples: The band is really in the groove tonight.We have a leg of mutton for dinner tonight.The theme for tonight's talk is education.We have a leg of mutton for dinner tonight.
乐队今晚演奏得精彩极了。我们今晚有只羊腿作晚餐。今天谈话的题目是教育。我们今晚有只羊腿作晚餐。

translation: adv. 太；也；很；还；非常；过度
examples: I will go, provided that you go too.It's too early for getting up.She broke her leg last week-and on her birthday too!I know too well that I get on her tits.
你也去的话我就去。现在起床还太早。她上星期把腿摔断了，而且还是在她生日那一天！我很明白自己惹怒了她。

translation: n. 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段vi. 使用工具；用机床装备工厂vt. 用工具给……加工
examples: Don't injure yourself with that tool.The metal tool clanged when it hit the ground.A vacuum cleaner is a handy household tool.Tissue culture is the most important tool used in virus assay.The prime minister was a mere tool in the hands of the country's president.He job is to tool accurately machine parts.When a user clicks and drags with the tool on the drawing area, the tool does its thing.Previous studies by UW psychology professors found that infants do not normally use a tool, such as a cane, spontaneously.
不要让那工具伤害到你。金属工具碰到地面时发出叮当声。吸尘器是一种使用方便的家庭用具。组织培养是用于病毒试验的最重要的手段。那个总理只不过是该国总统的马前卒。他的工作是精密加工机器零件。当用户在画图区域使用工具单击并拖动时，工具就执行操作。之前的华盛顿大学心理学教授的研究发现，婴儿一般不会本能地使用工具，如棒子。

translation: n. 牙齿vt. 给……装齿vi. 啮合n. (Tooth)人名；(英)图思
examples: This tooth is sensitive to cold.I was fitted an artificial tooth by the dentist.We should brush our teeth at least twice a day.He bellowed with pain when the tooth was pulled out.The sharp parts of a comb or a saw are called teeth.Mike's wife have a big sweet tooth.The law must be given more teeth if crime is to be properly controlled.
这颗牙对冷过敏。牙医给我镶了颗假牙。我们每天应该至少刷两次牙。牙被拔掉时，他疼得大叫。梳子和锯子的尖锐部分叫作齿。迈克的妻子非常喜欢吃甜食。要想有效控制住犯罪活动，就得加强法制的威力。

translation: n. 顶部，顶端；上部；首席；陀螺vi. 高出，超越；结束；达到顶点vt. 超越，超过；给…加盖；达到…的顶端adj. 最高的，顶上的；头等的n. (Top)人名；(英、土、意)托普
examples: The mountain tops are covered with snow.The staircase was short, and they were soon at the top.The green book is at the bottom of the pile and the red one is on top.He worked his way to the top of his profession.The child gazed at the spinning top.I live on the top floor.Tall as he is, he cannot reach the top shelf.
白雪覆盖着山顶。梯子是短的,他们一下子就到了顶上。绿皮书在那一堆书的底下，红皮书在上边。他一步一步努力，终于成为行业内的翘楚。孩子盯着旋转的陀螺。我住在顶层。尽管他高,他也够不着书架顶端。

translation: n. 城镇，市镇；市内商业区n. (Town)人名；(英)汤
examples: The town was invaded by reporters.It's a great convenience to live in town.Would you rather live in a town, or in the country?The town has been designated a development area.He lived in a town beside the sea.The town boasts four swimming pools.We are well served with gas in this town.The whole town is talking about it.Can you give me a lift into town?
这个城市涌进了大批记者。住在城市里有很大的方便。你愿意住在城市还是乡下？该城市已被定为开发区。他住在一个靠海的城镇。这座城镇以拥有四个游泳池而自豪。这个城镇煤气供应得很好。全镇的人都在议论这件事。你能让我搭车进城吗？

translation: n. 玩具；小装饰品；不值钱的东西vi. 玩弄；调情；随随便便地对待adj. 作为玩具的；玩物似的n. (Toy)人名；(英、土)托伊；(法)图瓦
examples: He was appointed to superintend the toy department.The child clutched his toy.
他获任玩具部的负责人。那个孩子紧抓着他的玩具不放。

translation: n. 轨道；足迹，踪迹；小道vt. 追踪；通过；循路而行；用纤拉vi. 追踪；走；留下足迹
examples: The tram is being switched on to another track .The cyclist went at full sail along the track.I quickly lose her track in the crowd.A track runs across the field to his house.Her new album has two great tracks on it.It's difficult to track an animal right after rain.The police tracked the terrorists to their hide-out.
电车正被移至另外一条轨道上。自行车手沿着跑道全速前进。我在人群中失去了她的踪迹。一条小路穿过原野通到他的家。她的新唱片集里有两段特别棒。刚下完雨后要追踪猎物是很困难的。警方跟踪恐怖分子至其藏匿处。

translation: n. 拖拉机；牵引机
examples: The tractor pulls well.The tractor had been damaged by rough usage.A tractor towed the car to the repair factory.The tractor has make deep furrow in the loose sand.
这台拖拉机拉力大。这辆拖拉机因使用不经心而损坏了。一辆牵引车将汽车拖去修理厂。曳引机在松软的沙土上留下了深深的车辙。

translation: adj. 传统的；惯例的
examples: The traditional breakfast in this area includes bacon and eggs.It's a garden in the traditional victorian style.
这个地区传统的早饭包括火腿和鸡蛋。这是一个传统的维多利亚风格的花园。

translation: n. 交通；运输；贸易；[通信] 通信量vt. 用…作交换；在…通行vi. 交易，买卖
examples: Traffic reaches a peak between 8 and 9 in the morning.His left knee was hurt in a traffic accident.There's usually a lot of traffic at this time of day.Drug traffic on city streets is a big problem.He trafficked in illicit liquor.
早晨八九点钟是交通的高峰时刻。他的左膝在一次交通事故中受伤了。每天在这段时间往来车辆都很多。在大街上非法进行毒品交易是个大问题。他做过买卖私酒的生意.

translation: n. 火车；行列；长队；裙裾v. 培养；训练；瞄准n. (Train)人名；(英)特雷恩；(法)特兰；(意)特拉因
examples: The 6:30 train for Berlin has been canceled.I lost my train by three minutes.I saw a camel train.The telephone rang and interrupted my train of thought.The challenger has been training hard for the big fight.In the interest of our clients, we would train their technical staff at request.He trained his binoculars on the distant figures.
6点30分开往柏林的列车已经取消。我迟了3分钟，没赶上火车。我看到了一队的骆驼。电话铃响了，打断了我的思路。这位健将为参加拳击大赛夺魁而进行坚苦的锻炼。从客户利益出发,我们会应客户要求培训他们的技术人员。他把双筒望远镜对准远处的景物。

translation: n. 训练；培养；瞄准；整枝v. 训练；教养（train的ing形式）
examples: The champion is in training for his next fight.They finished the preparatory training.The army training exercises ended with a mock battle.On the course she received a thorough training in every aspect of the job.I quite agree with you that he needs further training.
这位冠军为了下一场比赛正在进行训练。他们完成了预备训练。军事训练演习以一场模拟战结束。在训练班上，她接受了有关这个工作各方面的全面训练。我完全同意你的意见，他还需要进一步培养。

translation: vt. 诱捕；使…受限制；使…陷入困境；吸收；使…上当n. 陷阱；圈套；困境；[建] 存水湾vi. 设陷阱n. (Trap)人名；(英)特拉普
examples: The police set a trap to catch the thief.The only thing the wolf could do was climbing up to the ground from the trap.To break out of the poverty trap they need help from the government.She didn't say anything about a trap.By clever questioning they trapped him into making a confession.Some miners were trapped underground after the collapse.
警察设下了捉拿窃贼的圈套。那只狼惟一能做的就是从陷阱里爬到地面上来。为了摆脱贫困的处境，他们需要政府的帮助。她根本没提马车的事。他们用巧妙的提问诱使他招认了。塌方后，有些矿工被困在地下。

translation: vi. 旅行；行进；步行；交往vt. 经过；在…旅行n. 旅行；游历；漫游
examples: You are hardly fit to travel alone at present.I travel 40 miles to work every day.When we speak, sound waves begin to travel in all directions.I don't know the exact speed of the car, but it was certainly travelling.He met many interesting people in his travels.Travel on that road is heavy on holidays.
照目前的情况,你不宜单独旅行。我每天奔波40英里去上班。我们说话时,声波就开始向四面八方传播扩散。我不知道那辆汽车的准确速度,但它确实开得非常快。旅行中他遇到了许多有趣的人。假日里,那条路上人来车往极为拥挤。

translation: vt. 治疗；对待；探讨；视为vi. 探讨；请客；协商n. 请客；款待n. (Treat)人名；(英)特里特
examples: We should treat people and animals with humanity.Do not treat a naughty child rough.I decided to treat his remark as a joke.Do not treat me as if I were a child .The documentary treated the question in some detail.This boy is being treated for a heart condition.You ought to treat these matter with candor.This delicate glass must be treated with care.It is my turn to treat us today .A treat has been arranged for the old folk.Her enthusiastic treat made us very happy.
我们应该仁慈地对待人和动物。不要粗暴地对待顽皮的孩子。我决定把他的话当作戏言。不要把我当作小孩子看待。这部记录片探讨这个问题有些深度。这个男孩正在接受心脏病治疗。你应当公正处理此事。这精巧的玻璃杯处理时要小心。今天，该轮到我请客了。款待老人的事已作了安排。她的热情款待使我们感到非常高兴。

translation: n. 树；木料；树状物vt. 把...赶上树vi. 爬上树；逃上树n. (Tree)人名；(英)特里
examples: We plant trees and flowers in spring.In the storm I took shelter under the tree.She sat very still under the tree.Dates showered down when we shook the tree.The tree was fenced around with wire.A family tree means a history in that family.
我们在春天种花种树。暴风雨时，我正在树下躲避。她在树底下静静地坐着。我们摇树时，枣子纷纷落下。那棵树被铁丝网围了起来。家谱是一个家族的历史。

translation: vi. 绊倒；远足；犯错误；轻快地走n. 旅行；绊倒；差错vt. 绊倒；使犯错n. (Trip)人名；(荷)特里普
examples: They planned to make a wedding trip to Paris.He who carries three baskets must put one on his head, which is apt to tumble and trip him up.He tried to trip me up.He tripped on a tree root.I hope to trip with my leisure time.She came tripping down the garden path.I have never known him to trip up even in details.
他们计划到巴黎旅行度蜜月。有三只篮子的人就得把一只篮子顶在头上，这样很容易摔倒。他想把我绊倒。他被一株树根绊倒了。我希望空闲时去旅游。她轻快地沿花园小径跑过来。即使在琐事上我都不曾看到他犯错。

translation: [车辆] 无轨电车
examples: The trolley bus picks up current from an overhead wire.Trolley bus, as a possible future transport mode, may also fall into this category.We got out of the trolley bus at Yan'an Road.Trolley buses pass this place at short intervals.
无轨电车的电能是通过架空线供给的。日后可能采用的无轨电车也属于这一类别。我们在延安路下了电车。每隔一会儿就来一辆电车。

translation: n. 麻烦；烦恼；故障；动乱vt. 麻烦；使烦恼；折磨vi. 费心，烦恼
examples: I find getting up early a great trouble.I'm sorry to have to put you to so much trouble.Don't mention my name or you'll get me into trouble.I'm sorry to trouble you, but I wondered if we could have a word some time.May I trouble you to move your chair a bit?
我觉得早起床可不容易。很抱歉，给您添了这麽多麻烦。别提我的名字，免得给我惹麻烦。很遗憾要打扰你一下，我想问问我们什么时候能聊聊。麻烦你把椅子挪一挪行吗?

translation: n. 裤子，长裤
examples: Flared trousers are out this year.The boy's trousers need a patch on the knee.He tucked his shirt into his trousers.This pair of trousers is too tight for me.Their dog bit a hole in my trousers.
今年喇叭裤不时兴了。这孩子的裤子膝盖上需要打个补丁。他把衬衫下摆塞入裤中。这条裤子我穿太紧了。他们的狗把我的裤子咬了个窟窿。

translation: n. 卡车；交易；手推车vi. 驾驶卡车；以物易物vt. 交易；以卡车运输adj. （美）运货汽车的n. (Truck)人名；(德)特鲁克
examples: The truck was heavily loaded.They transported the goods by truck.Move cylinders using a suitable hand truck or cart.Shortly, he bought a cart, then a truck, and then he had his own fleet of delivery vehicles.My pride and joy was a new Ford pickup truck.We'll have no further truck with them.I wouldn't want you to have truck with the family.They raise truck on their farm.They trucked the goods over immediately.
这辆卡车装载很重。他们用卡车运货。用合适的手推车或移动钢瓶。很短的时间里，他买了个手推车，然后卡车，接着他有了自己的运输车队。福特敞篷小货车是我骄傲和快乐之所在。我们将不再同他们做生意。我不想让你和这个家庭交往。他们在自己的农场上种植商品蔬菜。他们用卡车立刻把这批货物运送过去。

translation: adj. 真实的；正确的adv. 真实地；准确地n. 真实；准确vt. 装准n. (TRUE)人名；(英)特鲁
examples: She gave the true account of what had happened.On what grounds do you say that is true?We both thought that he had given a true judgement.He was true to his word.She spoke truer than she knew.The arrow flew straight and true to its mark.Two of the pictures hanging on the wall are out of true.It is not easy to true up a frame.
她如实地讲述了发生的事情。你根据什么说那是真的?我们都认为他给出了正确的判断。他信守诺言。她说的比她了解的更接近事实。那箭不偏不斜地直朝目标飞去。挂在墙上的照片中有两张挂得不正。做个标准的框架也不容易。

translation: n. 真理；事实；诚实；实质
examples: It is far from the truth.The truth verified the allegations.Practice is the sole criterion of truth.In science, mistakes always precede the truth.There is no truth in what he says.Your remark was wide of the truth.He tried to varnish over the truth with a lie.They were waiting with assurance for me to discover the truth for myself.
这哪里是事实。事实证明了这些说法。实践是检验真理的唯一标准。在科学的领域中，错误一定会出现在真理之前。他说的没有一句实话。你说的话很不真实。他试图用谎言来掩盖真相。他们自信地等待我自己发现事实真相。

translation: vt. 试图，努力；试验；审判；考验vi. 尝试；努力；试验n. 尝试；努力；试验n. (Try)人名；(英、印尼)特里；(柬)德里
examples: This idea seems good but you need to try it out.I think I'll try my luck at roulette.He is trying his best to understand his meaning.Don't try to smooth over your faults.He is trying his best to understand his meaning.A youth was tried in the criminal court for stealing.His courage was severely tried by his ordeal.After a few tries they decided to give up.I just don't see why we shouldn't give it a try.
这个想法似乎不错,但是需要试验一下。我想玩玩轮盘赌碰碰运气。他正在尽力弄明白他的意思。不要设法掩饰你的过错。他正在尽力弄明白他的意思。一个青年因偷窃罪而在刑事庭受审。他的勇气在艰难困苦中经受了严峻的考验。试了几次后，他们决定放弃。我不明白怎么就不能试一下。

translation: n. 星期二
examples: School will begin next Tuesday.He's available on Tuesday.
下星期二将要开学。星期二他在。

translation: n. 火鸡；笨蛋；失败之作
examples: It's traditional in England to eat turkey on Christmas Day.People often drink white wine with turkey.Russia thereupon declared war upon Turkey.
圣诞节时吃火鸡是英格兰的传统。人们经常边吃火鸡肉边喝白葡萄酒。俄国于是对土耳其宣战。

translation: vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换vi. 转向；转变；转动n. 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止n. (Turn)人名；(德、匈)图恩
examples: The turbulence caused the plane to turn over.Men carried corpses in blankets away from the scene and a dozen others tried to turn over a car with two bodies beneath.At each turn the screw goes in further.She got up and spun a little turn.The earth turns round the sun.The river turns north at this point.Nothing will ever turn him from his purpose.The students clean the classroom everyday in turn.It is now his turn to set me up to a nice dinner.Hold the strap, please. I am making a turn now.
空气的激流导致飞机翻转。搬运工把用毯子盖着的尸体搬离现场，另有十多人试图翻转汽车，搬出下面的两具尸体。每一次旋转都使螺丝钉更向里进。她站起身来，打了个小旋转。地球绕日运行。这条河从这里转向北方。什么也不能使他改变目标。学生们每天轮流打扫教室。现在轮到他请我吃一顿丰盛的晚餐了。请抓牢皮带。我现在要转弯了。

translation: n. 转向；旋转；回转；转弯处v. 旋转（turn的ing形式）
examples: Unscrew the bonnet by turning counterclockwise.They are developing a new turning mechanism for the device.Lester hung up his hat and coat, then, turning, he caught his first glimpse.In this paper, the rudder effect and turning maneuver test results of a singly moored Pusher are introduced.The world is turning to renewable energy resources.Turning to the left of me, I glimpsed the quays, the harbor.
反时针方向旋转拧松阀盖。他们正在研制这一设备的新的旋转装置。雷斯脱挂好了帽子大衣，回转身来就瞥见了她的第一眼。本文介绍了一艘装有转柱舵推轮的单船系泊舵效试验及船队回转试验。世界正转向开发可再生能源。我把头转向左方，一眼望见了港口的码头。

translation: adj. 第十二的，第十二个的；十二分之一的n. 第十二；月的第十二日
examples: The twelfth fairy stepped forward.The twelfth fairy stepped forward.I now declare open the Twelfth National Congress of the Communist Party of China.It's on the twelfth of February.
第十二的仙女向前地踏。第十二的仙女向前地踏。中国共产党第十二次全国代表大会现在开幕。在二月十二日。

translation: n. 十二；十二个num. 十二；十二个adj. 十二的；十二个的
examples: She often puts in twelve hours' work a day.How old are you? I am twelve (years old).The clock struck at twelve o'clock sharp.
她常常一天工作十二小时你几岁？我十二岁。钟在整十二点钟打点。

translation: n. 二十分之一adj. 第二十的；二十分之一的num. 第二十
examples: One twentieth of the total output was exported.He was the twentieth in the competition.He was the twentieth in the competition.
产量中有二十分之一出口。他在竞赛中名列第二十。他在竞赛中名列第二十。

translation: 第二十一
examples: Next monday is my birthday of twenty first.The New Year always starts between January the twenty first and February the twentieth.As the twenty first century dawns, CUHK has articulated a vision of excellence in teaching and research, of diversity in the student body, and of recognition across the region.Are the Chinese cities improving their position in the early twenty first century?This is answered by computing standardised changes in connectivity, 2000-04.Abbado's set is one for the Twenty First Century - and one that I do not see being easily surpassed (even though we still have Sir Simon Rattle's complete set with the Vienna Philharmonic to come).Nineteen twenty first second third

下星期一是我二十一岁的生日。 新年通常从1月21号和2月20号之间的一天开始。 廿一世纪伊始，中文大学将承先启后，继续追求教研卓越，多元文化的理想，立足香港，面向全球，成为一所具影响力的国际学府。 2.;中国城市是否在二十一个世纪早期有更好的表现并改进他们的排名?计算他们在2000与2004之间连通性的变化可以回答以上问题。 至于拜因鲁斯管弦乐团，除了那次传奇录音，这支乐队的发挥还很不稳定，而斯德哥尔摩爱乐乐团则根本不具备一流乐团的实力。 十九二十首先第二第三

translation: adv. 两次；两倍
examples: I am more than twice as old as he.The length of the table is twice its breadth.I've seen this film twice.We should brush our teeth at least twice a day.Our study group gets together twice a week.
我的年龄是他的两倍还不止。桌子的长度是它的宽度的两倍。这部影片我已经看过两次了。我们每天应该至少刷两次牙。我们的学习小组每周集中活动两次。

translation: vt. 使成对n. 双胞胎中一人adj. 双胞胎的vi. 成对；生双胞胎n. (Twin)人名；(英)特温
examples: I always confounded him with his twin brother.They are motivated by the twin goads of punishment and reward.I can't tell one twin from the other.
我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。他们受赏与罚的双重因素所激励。我分不出双胞胎中谁是谁。

translation: n. 两个adj. 两个的num. 二
examples: Two plus five is seven.All things invariably divide into two.At that time he had two helpers.The two boys decided to play truant and go fishing.
二加五等于七。事物都是一分为二的。当时他有两个助手。这两个男孩决定逃学去钓鱼。

translation: n. 类型，品种；模范；样式vt. 打字；测定（血等）类型vi. 打字n. (Type)人名；(英)泰普
examples: I'm unfamiliar with this type of computer.There are two types of rocks in this area.I don't think she's the artistic type.Could you type this letter for me?It's so sweet of you to type these letters for me.
我不熟悉这种类型的计算机。这个地区有两种类型的岩石。我认为她不属艺术家那类的人。你能为我打这封信吗？真太感谢你帮我打好了这些信件。

translation: 带走，拿走，取走
examples: He wants to know who have take away his dictionary.I want to take away the book which you showed me yesterday.If you take four away from ten, that leaves six.Nothing can take away the anguish of losing a child.Nothing can take away the anguish of losing a child from his parents.
他想知道谁拿走了他的词典。我想带走你昨天给我看的那本书。十减去四得六。什么都不能解除失去孩子的巨大悲痛。什么也无法解除父母失去孩子的这种极度痛苦。

translation: 从容；不急；松懈
examples: Don't worry, I'll fix it with Sarah.Take easy, and sleep tight with me.On holidays, we like to go to the forest cabin and let it all hang out.
别着急，我会和萨拉商量安排好的。放轻松点，让我陪你一夜好眠吧！在假日，我们喜欢去森林小木屋完全放轻松。

translation: 起飞；脱下；离开
examples: The plane took off despite the fog.He came in and took off his coat.The mixed grill has been taken off (the menu).Doctors recommended that the drug should be taken off the market.The train will take off at 7 this evening.His leg had to be taken off above the knee.She takes off the Prime Minister to perfection.
尽管有雾，飞机仍照常起飞。他走了进来,脱掉大衣。烤杂拌这道菜已(从菜单上)取消了。医生建议市面上应停止出售该类药物。火车今晚7点钟离开。他的一条腿从膝盖以上截去了。她模仿首相的样子维妙维肖。

translation: v. 取出；去掉；出发；发泄；把…带出去；邀请（某人）外出；开始
examples: If you lay up a car for the winter, you should take out the battery.An incision was made into his hand to take out the splinter.I saw him enter the room, unlock a drawer, take out a document, photograph it and put it back.How many teeth did the dentist take out?He took out the pencil marks from his drawing.Did they tell you when to start out?He joyfully consented and we set out.They took out their resentments on each other.He will take out for home next month.
如果冬天把车闲搁在汽车房里，就该取出电瓶。他手上切开了一个口子以便取出那根刺。我看见他进了房间，打开抽屉的锁，取出文件，照了相，然后又把它放回去。牙科医生给患者拔了几颗牙？他把面上的铅笔印擦掉。他们告没告诉你什么时候出发？他欣然同意，我们就出发了。他们互相发泄怨气。他下月启程回家。

translation: 发生；举行
examples: The meeting will take place soon.An fatal accident took place at this cross three years ago.The fete will take place on Sunday, rain or shine.Lengthy negotiations must take place before any agreement can be reached.
会议即将举行。这个十字路口三年前发生了一起死亡事故。游园义卖会定于星期日举行,风雨无阻。要进行多次长时间谈判才能达成协议。

translation: 代替
examples: I will take the place of your teacher.We had no one to take the place of John.The new always take the place of the old.We have arranged for another man to take his place.
我将代替你们老师工作。我们没有谁能代替约翰的工作。新生事物总是会取代旧的事物。我们已安排好由另一个人取代他。

translation: 拿起；开始从事；占据(时间,地方)
examples: She took up the receiver and began to dial the number.When did you take up Japanese as a second foreign language?It is necessary for us to take up productive labour.Use a blotter to take up the spilt ink.You should take up my suggestion and start saving money.They take up too much space.She took up the narrative where John had left off.
她拿起听筒开始拨电话号码。你什么时间开始选修日语作为第二语言?我们需要从事生产劳动。用一张吸墨纸把溅出来的墨水吸掉。你应该接受我的建议,开始存钱。它们占了太多空间。她接着讲约翰未讲完的故事。

translation: 谈论某事
examples: We had a general talk about drama.They buzzed about Halley's romantic affair.His face hardened when talked about the battle.She clammed up when we began to talk about Jimmy.
我们泛泛谈论戏剧。他们嘁嘁喳喳地谈论哈利的风流韵事。在谈到那次战斗时，他的表情严峻起来。每当我们谈到吉米时，她就不说话了。

translation: 谈论，议论；谈到，说到
examples: She spoke of the emancipation of women.They kept the talk up until midnight.She blushed at the mention of her love's name.Speaking of hamburgers, I am as hungry as a hawk.
她谈到了妇女的解放。他们一直谈到午夜。她因说到她情人的名字而脸红。说到汉堡包，我感到饿极了。

translation: 后天
examples: Your film will be processed the day after tomorrow.On a showery day, the sun beamed down.
你的胶卷后天就可以冲洗出来。下午雨后天晴，云开日出。

translation: 前天
examples: I went shopping the day before yesterday.The foreign boy moved to China the other day.
我前天去购物了。这个外国男孩前天搬到了中国。

translation: 不久前某一天；几天以前
examples: I bought a pair of tan leather shoes the other day.The days that preceded were filled with activity.The other day I heard a twig snap in it.
前几天我买了双棕褐色的皮鞋。前几天排满了活动。不久前的一天，我听见园内一根小树枝啦地响了一声。

translation: 考虑
examples: I'll think over your suggestion again.He needs some time to think the matter out.
我将再次仔细考虑你的建议。他需要时间来仔细考虑一下那件事。

translation: 记起，想起；考虑；想像；关心
examples: I couldn't think of the name of that man anyhow.He would never think of letting his daughter marry a fellow like you.She thought of several possibilities.I wouldn't think of disturbing them at this hour of the night.Let's think of some questions about life.I'm thinking of investing in a new car.What do you think of his new job?
我怎么也想不出那人的名字来了。他决不会想到让女儿嫁给像你这样的家伙。她考虑了几种可能的情况。我不能想象这样深更半夜去打扰他们。让我们对生活设想一些问题吧。我打算花一笔钱买辆新汽车。你对他的新工作看法如何？

translation: 许多，无数；数以千计的……，成千上万的……
examples: There are thousands of awnings on the sea beach.The liberal candidate romped through with thousands of votes to spare.The novel captured the imagination of thousands of readers.The press has reported the massacre of thousands of people for their religious beliefs.Men have been making music for thousands of years.The cyclone brought misery to thousands of people.On the night of December1,1930, a cloud of smog moved over a valley in Belgium, which caused thousands of people to become ill.The fair is a big gathering. Thousands of businessmen from more than150 countries and regions are here to trade with China.
沙滩上有许多遮阳篷。自由党候选人轻易获胜，超出选票数以千计。这部小说引起了千万读者的想象。新闻界报道了那场因宗教信仰原因而对千万人的大屠杀。人类创作音乐已有数千年历史。暴风给成千上万的人带来灾难。1930年12月1日晚上，一片烟雾飘过比利时的一个山谷，这使数千人病倒了。本次交易会是一次盛会。来自150多个国家和地区的成千上万的商人在这里与中国进行贸易。

translation: 扔掉，丢弃
examples: It is a waste to throw away good food.He had to toss those rotten apples away.Abandoned by her lover, Mary pined away.When he grew rich, Dirk cast away his old friends.
把好的食物扔掉是浪费。他不得不把腐烂的苹果扔掉。玛丽因被情人抛弃而憔悴不堪。德克发财时，抛弃了旧友。

translation: 试穿；试验
examples: The clerk held out a dress for Martha to try on.Mary tried on the dress and found it was too tight.
店员拿出一件衣服给玛莎试穿。玛丽试穿那件衣服，觉得太紧了。

translation: 试验；提炼；考验
examples: The method seems good but it needs to be tried out.They are trying out the new method.Shirley will try out for the lead in the play.He was selected out of many graduates.
这个方法似乎不错，但需要试验一下。他们正在试验那种新方法。雪莉将参加该剧主角的选拔演出。他是从许多毕业生中选拔出来的。

translation: 减小，关小，调低；拒绝
examples: Turn the heat down or your cake will burn.Please turn the radio down a bit.She petitioned her neighbor to turn down the radio.I turn down the offer.The board turn down all approach on the subject of merger.She turned down every offer of help.
把热度调低吧,要不蛋糕就要糊了。请把收音机关小点。她请求邻居把收音机关小点声。我拒绝那个提议。董事长拒绝了有关合并事宜的任何协商。别人提出的帮助他都拒绝了。

translation: 关掉，关闭；拐弯，使转变方向；使失去兴趣
examples: Please turn off the electric power.Do you mind if I turn off the light?Turn off the switch when anything goes wrong with the machine.You should have had enough sense to turn off the electricity supply before disconnecting the wires.
请把电源关掉。我把灯关掉你不反对吗?如果机器出故障，就把开关关掉。你本来应该有足够的常识，在拆开电线之前先把电源切断。

translation: v. 打开；发动；取决于；使兴奋；攻击
examples: He asked me to turn on the radio for him.The North waged war on the South.Hitler's attack on Poland led up to World War Two.The success of a picnic usually turns on the weather.She's often turned on by men with beards.His normally placid dog turned on him and bit him in the leg.Why are you all turning on me ?
他让我替他打开收音机。北方发动对南方的战争。他们发动了这场战争。参加野餐是否尽兴，通常要看天气好坏。有胡子的男子每每引起她的性欲。他那条狗平日很温顺，这次突然发作咬了他的腿。你们为什么都冲我来了?

translation: 移交给；翻阅；把…翻过来；发动；营业额达到；反复考虑
examples: If you turn over you might find it easier to get to sleep.This shop turns over no less than 100 pounds a day.This supermarket turns over its stock very rapidly.He turned the business over to his daughter.He was turning over pages of an encyclopedia.
你翻翻身,就容易睡着了。这家商店营业额一天不少于100英镑。这家超级商场商品周转很快。他把生意移交给女儿管理。他在翻阅一本百科全书。

translation: 出现；发生；开大；发现；卷起；使仰卧
examples: Their misfit coats were heavy with melted snow and turned up at the collars.For some reason she didn't turn up.It was time to turn to building their own lives.He rolled up his sleeves and got down to work.The machine cast up a big heap of earth.He hunted up a restaurant to appease his hunger.Turn left, and you will find the building.How do you explain this strange turn of events?He keeps bobbing up in the most unlikely places.Something unexpected has turned up.Things took a more decisive turn.He turned up the volume on the television.The kids cranked up the volume on the stereo and started to practice their moves.

不合身的上衣，被融雪湿透，变得沉甸甸的，衣领都朝上翻起。由于某种原因，她没有来。那么着手开创个人生活天地的时代便来到了。他卷起袖子开始工作。机器卷起了一大堆泥土。他好容易找到一家餐馆去填饱肚子。向左转，你就会找到那一栋建筑物。事情出现这种异常变化，你作何解释？他总是在极不可能出现的地方突然出现。发生了没有意料到的事情。事情发生了更有决定性意义的转折。他把电视机的音量调大了。这些孩子把音响的声音调大，开始练习他们的舞步。
